About Me

I'm a passionate software engineer with a focus on creating elegant solutions to complex problems.

My Journey

With over 2 years of experience in software development, I've worked on a variety of projects ranging from web applications to mobile apps and enterprise solutions.

My expertise lies in building scalable, efficient, and user-friendly applications using modern technologies and best practices. I'm passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and creating exceptional user experiences.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge through blog posts and mentoring.

Featured Projects

Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and interests.

Event Management System

The Event Management System is a full-stack web application designed to simplify the planning, organizing, and registration process for events. It allows event organizers to create and manage events while enabling users to browse upcoming events, register, and receive updates.

ReactTailwind CSSnextjs

Task Management App

Backend for a food delivery app using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB; supports orders, users, restaurants, authentication, and real-time tracking.

Node.jsExpressMongoDBnodemailerJWTbcrypt

Twitter Backend

A scalable backend for a Twitter-like application, handling user authentication, tweet creation, following, and real-time notifications.

Node.jsExpress.jsMongoDBJWT AuthenticationSocket.ioMongoosebcrypt

Landing Page Website

An interactive website with 3D elements, animations, and a custom design system built with Three.js and React.

ReactThree.jsFramer MotionTailwind CSS
